ComicInfo.Title: Kill-Krazy Klown!
ComicInfo.Summary: A huge corporation coupled with a mad scientist subject a circus clown to a horrible experiment in the hopes of creating a super entertainer, capable of entertaining indefinitely. When the experiment fails, leaving an undead zombie called Dead Clown, the corpotate big wig sees dollar signs. When Dead Clown refuses to cooperate, the bumbling super hero team Force America is called in to persuade him.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 12:25:02. [CVDB144583] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 03:48:33. [Issue ID 259417]
